org.openmuc.jmbus

Class MBusConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openmuc.jmbus.MBusConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class MBusConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    M-Bus Application Layer connection.

    Use this access point to communicate using the M-Bus wired protocol.

    See Also:
    newSerialBuilder(String), newTcpBuilder(String, int)

        Closes the service access point.

      • setVerboseMessageListener

        public void setVerboseMessageListener(VerboseMessageListener verboseMessageListener)
        Sets the verbose mode on if a implementation of debugMessageListener has been set.
        Parameters:

      • scan

        public java.util.List<SecondaryAddress> scan(java.lang.String wildcardMask,
                                             SecondaryAddressListener secondaryAddressListener)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Scans for secondary addresses and returns all detected devices in a list and if SecondaryAddressListener not null to the listen listener.
        Parameters:
        wildcardMask - a wildcard mask for masking
        secondaryAddressListener - listener to get scan messages and scanned secondary address just at time.
        If null, all detected address will only returned if finished.
        Returns:
        a list of secondary addresses of all detected devices
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any kind of error (including timeout) occurs while writing to the remote device. Note that the connection is not closed when an IOException is thrown.

      • read

        public VariableDataStructure read(int primaryAddress)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.io.InterruptedIOException
        Reads a meter using primary addressing. Sends a data request (REQ_UD2) to the remote device and returns the variable data structure from the received RSP_UD frame.
        Parameters:
        primaryAddress - the primary address of the meter to read. For secondary address use 0xfd.
        Returns:
        the variable data structure from the received RSP_UD frame
        Throws:
        java.io.InterruptedIOException - if no response at all (not even a single byte) was received from the meter within the timeout span.
        java.io.IOException - if any kind of error (including timeout) occurs while trying to read the remote device. Note that the connection is not closed when an IOException is thrown.
        java.io.InterruptedIOException - if no response at all (not even a single byte) was received from the meter within the timeout span.

      • sendLongMessage

        public MBusMessage sendLongMessage(int primaryAddr,
                                   int controlField,
                                   int ci,
                                   byte[] data,
                                   boolean responseExpected)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a long message with individual parameters. Used for messages which arn't not predefined in MBusConnection.
        If no response message is expected, set hasResponse to false. Returns null if hasResponse is false
        Parameters:
        primaryAddr - the primary address of the meter to read. For secondary address use 0xfd.
        controlField - control field (C Field) has the size of 1 byte.
        ci - control information field (CI Field) has the size of 1 byte.
        data - the data to sends to the meter.
        responseExpected - set this flag to false if no response is expected else true. If false returns null
        Returns:
        returns null if boolean hasResponse is false.
        returns the MBusMessage if a message received.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any kind of error (including timeout) occurs while trying to send to or read the remote device. Note that the connection is not closed when an IOException is thrown.

      • sendShortMessage

        public MBusMessage sendShortMessage(int primaryAddr,
                                    int cmd,
                                    boolean responseExpected)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a short message with individual parameters. Used for messages which arn't not predefined in MBusConnection.
        For normal readout use read(int).
        If no response message is expected, set hasResponse to false. Returns null if hasResponse is false
        Parameters:
        primaryAddr - the primary address of the meter to read. For secondary address use 0xfd.
        cmd - the command to send to the meter.
        responseExpected - set this flag to false if no response is expected else true. If false returns null
        Returns:
        returns null if boolean hasResponse is false.
        returns the MBusMessage if a message received.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - f any kind of error (including timeout) occurs while trying to send to or read the remote device. Note that the connection is not closed when an IOException is thrown.

      • write

        public void write(int primaryAddress,
                  byte[] data)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  java.io.InterruptedIOException
        Writes to a meter using primary addressing. Sends a data send (SND_UD) to the remote device and returns a true if slave sends a 0x7e else false
        Parameters:
        primaryAddress - the primary address of the meter to write. For secondary address use 0xfd.
        data - the data to sends to the meter.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any kind of error (including timeout) occurs while writing to the remote device. Note that the connection is not closed when an IOException is thrown.
        java.io.InterruptedIOException - if no response at all (not even a single byte) was received from the meter within the timeout span.

      • selectComponent

        public void selectComponent(SecondaryAddress secondaryAddress)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            java.io.InterruptedIOException
        Selects the meter with the specified secondary address. After this the meter can be read on primary address 0xfd.
        Parameters:
        secondaryAddress - the secondary address of the meter to select.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any kind of error (including timeout) occurs while trying to read the remote device. Note that the connection is not closed when an IOException is thrown.
        java.io.InterruptedIOException - if no response at all (not even a single byte) was received from the meter within the timeout span.

      • deselectComponent

        public void deselectComponent()
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.io.InterruptedIOException
        Deselects the previously selected meter.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any kind of error (including timeout) occurs while trying to read the remote device. Note that the connection is not closed when an IOException is thrown.
        java.io.InterruptedIOException - if no response at all (not even a single byte) was received from the meter within the timeout span.

      • selectForReadout

        public void selectForReadout(int primaryAddress,
                             java.util.List<DataRecord> dataRecords)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             java.io.InterruptedIOException
        Selection of wanted records.
        Parameters:
        primaryAddress - primary address of the slave
        dataRecords - data record to select
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any kind of error (including timeout) occurs while trying to read the remote device. Note that the connection is not closed when an IOException is thrown.
        java.io.InterruptedIOException - if no response at all (not even a single byte) was received from the meter within the timeout span.

      • resetReadout

        public void resetReadout(int primaryAddress)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.io.InterruptedIOException
        Sends a application reset to the slave with specified primary address.
        Parameters:
        primaryAddress - primary address of the slave
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any kind of error (including timeout) occurs while trying to read the remote device. Note that the connection is not closed when an IOException is thrown.
        java.io.InterruptedIOException - if no response at all (not even a single byte) was received from the meter within the timeout span.

      • linkReset

        public void linkReset(int primaryAddress)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      java.io.InterruptedIOException
        Sends a SND_NKE message to reset the FCB (frame counter bit).
        Parameters:
        primaryAddress - the primary address of the meter to reset.
        Throws:
        java.io.InterruptedIOException - if the slave does not answer with an 0xe5 message within the configured timeout span.
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs during the reset process.
        java.io.InterruptedIOException - if the slave does not answer with an 0xe5 message within the configured timeout span.

                                                          int port)

      • newSerialBuilder

        public static MBusConnection.MBusSerialBuilder newSerialBuilder(java.lang.String serialPortName)
        Create a new builder to connect to a serial.
        Parameters:
        serialPortName - the serial port. e.g. /dev/ttyS0.
        Returns:
        a new connection builder.
